title: The Muppet Christmas Carol (1992) - Extended
description:
This is an edited version of the film, presented mostly in widescreen but with a switch back to full screen for the song 'When Love is Gone'. This is a longer version than you will find on most DVD and Blu-Ray releases.

Timeline of the versions of the film:
1992 - Movie released. Song 'When Love is Gone' cut from theatrical release for not having any muppets in.
1993 - Movie issued on VHS. 'When Love is Gone' reinstated at director's request, saying that if people didn't like it they could always skip through it.
2002 - Movie released on DVD in America. 'When Love is Gone' again cut, as per theatrical release. 
2002-2012 - Many DVD and Blu-Ray releases across the world. 'When Love is Gone' absent in all but one: a US DVD which has two versions of the film, one in widescreen without the song and one in fullscreen with the song. 

After much strife I have obtained these two versions of the film, and edited them together so that you can have the experience of viewing it in widescreen with a smooth transition to fullscreen for the one song, and then back to widescreen for the remainder. Hopefully one day they'll release a widescreen edition with the song reinstated. Until then, I'm spreading the love. The love is found.
